sentences.en: A drawback is made on customs duties on imported goods when they are later exported.
sentences.cn: 进口货物日后出口时将退还其进口关税.

sentences.en: All drying schedules extending over several hours have one serious drawback.
sentences.cn: 所有这些持续数小时以上的烘干作业有严重的缺点.

sentences.en: Cash flow statement prepared using the direct method has a significant drawback.
sentences.cn: 现金流量表编制使用直接的方法有重大缺陷.

sentences.en: He felt the apartment's only drawback was that it was too small.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这个公寓唯一的缺点就是太小了。

sentences.en: It’s a great city – the only drawback is the weather.
sentences.cn: 这是座很不错的城市，唯一的不足就是天气。

sentences.en: Lack of funds can be a drawback if you want to invest in a sure thing.
sentences.cn: 如果你要对确有把握的事投资,资金短缺会是个障碍.

sentences.en: One drawback of this approach is that the words must be registered in the system beforehand.
sentences.cn: 这种方法的缺点是必须把词预先存贮在系统中.

sentences.en: The documents which you have entitle you to drawback for duties paid.
sentences.cn: 你拥有的这些文件使你有权退税.

sentences.en: The drawback of a pulldown in TTL is that it wastes power.
sentences.cn: 在ttl中的下拉的缺点是,浪费能源.

sentences.en: The main drawback is that cell phones interfere with others.
sentences.cn: 手机的缺点主要是干扰他人.

sentences.en: The main drawback of cadaver skin application is the transmission of infections.
sentences.cn: 应用尸体异体皮的主要缺点是疾病的传染.

sentences.en: The main drawback to coke - oven is that the amount available depends on the production of coke.
sentences.cn: 焦炉气的主要缺点是气的供应量取决于焦炭生产情况.

sentences.en: The main drawback to it is the cost.
sentences.cn: 它的主要缺点是成本高。

sentences.en: The neighborhood of the railway is a drawback.
This is a good car. Its only drawback is that it uses a lot of petrol.
sentences.cn: 这是一部好汽车. 它唯一缺点是耗油较多.

trans.tran_en: a disadvantage of a situation, plan, product etc
